attributes.action: Remove Boris Johnson from his seat as prime minister
attributes.additional_details: The pandemic has been poorly handled. Almost all other countries are able to remove covid restrictions and still be safe whereas the UK not only has dealt with it extremely poorly, the daily deaths are increasing, there's another strain, covid measures have all been pointlessly delayed All orders were immediately hit with a U turn effectively causing more damage The economy has been put over the welfare of the people, and therefore both are suffering as a result. WE NEED SOMEONE WE CAN TRUST.
attributes.background: Have boris removed from his position, and those under him directly following/influencing his orders

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
